3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Reva Tolbert - Agt: 510-339-4761 - This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to own an impeccably constructed 4 bedroom, 3 bath home that skillfully blends the back-to-nature aesthetic and radical experimentalism that were popular themes in 1970s architecture. Sunlight streams through triangular windows throughout, bringing out the rich, golden tones of the natural wood. An efficient, well-appointed kitchen features shaker cabinets, granite countertops and stainless appliances. Also found on the main floor are a bedroom and adjacent full bath.  Golden hardwood floors lend light and warmth to the lower level, which houses two bedrooms with private decks, a hall bath and a laundry area. One deck can only be accessed through a concealed breezeway, presenting an interesting opportunity for creating a hidden getaway. A barn door at the foot of the stairs and secure outside access gives you the versatility for live/work or shared living arrangements. Upstairs, the loft area has a relaxing, Zen-like feel that allows you to fully appreciate the artistry in the precise planes of the dodecagonal cathedral ceiling. A convenient closet and full bath transform the loft into a tranquil primary or guest suite. Minutes from Montclair Village, you’ll enjoy easy access to popular shops and restaurants.
Confidential Remarks: DRIVING DIRECTIONS: Snake Road to Colton Boulevard to Arrowhead Drive  PROPERTY ACCESS: Access Supra on the front metal railing.   SHOWING TIMES SATURDAY AND SUNDAY: ONLY Noon TO 4:00 pm  OFFERS: Please submit all offers through HomeLight.  OPEN HOUSE: No Open House

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled in the hills of Montclair, amongst the trees and just minutes from Montclair Village, this two bedroom single family home is the perfect blend of urban and country living! Featuring a remodeled kitchen with SS appliances, generously sized rooms, a sauna, and decks off each level, this spacious home offers a move-in ready respite from the real world. Gaze out the windows on one side of the house to enjoy canyon views, or relax on one of the decks and be immersed in nature. Both bedrooms offer an en-suite full bathroom while a half bath on the entry level is perfect for visitors. A two car garage, gas fireplace and a laundry room that's located on the bedroom level are just a few of the thoughtful touches this home offers. You don't want to miss this stunning opportunity, minutes from all the conveniences of Montclair Village and its many coffee shops, restaurants, and local small businesses!
Confidential Remarks: Vacant. Supra on front door. Sq. ft. per tax record and is not warranted nor guaranteed by Broker nor Agent. No animals allowed in the property during showings or escrow. Please call/text Agent with questions. Fridge Not working. Go/Show-Leave card.

Nestled in the heart of the highly sought-after Montclair neighborhood, you’ll find a stylish and welcoming home that seamlessly blends modern luxury and comfortable elegance. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Anne Culbertson - Agt: 510-551-5508 - Delightful sun-soaked mod cottage with a bonus office/third bedroom tucks into an oversized lot in the soothing air of Montclair. Featured in Architectural Digest for the owner’s creative injection of color and verve, this light-filled view home combines style, substance and sparkle. Two tranquil bedrooms are augmented by a bonus room that’s ideal for an office or third bedroom (or both!). Airy living room has a brick fireplace and picture window framing Bay views and city lights. Dining room opens to rear patio, which invites al fresco entertaining and flows to a bodacious, sunny backyard haven that any urban farmer, nature lover or ADU designer will relish. The sky is practically the limit in this Bay view backyard – if you can dream it, you can probably make it happen. Come for the front, stay for the back, savor the house in between. System updates and pretty landscaping make this a move-in-ready retreat. Spacious garage has room for both parking and storage. When city life beckons, roll down the peaceful streets to enjoy the robust amenities of Montclair Village just moments from your sunshiny front door.
Confidential Remarks: Square footage of house and lot were derived from public records; no source of information have been verified by broker or seller. Bonus room is staged and has been used as a third bedroom, but it it not reflected as a bedroom in public records.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Dana S. Cohen - 510-813-0321 - Welcome to this updated mid-century gem tucked away on a tranquil cul-de-sac in the desirable Oakland neighborhood of Montclair. The home’s design effortlessly blends indoor and outdoor living set against a backdrop of lush greenery. Inside you'll discover a thoughtfully designed home with tons of flexibility to meet everyone’s needs. The inviting living/dining great room features a gas fireplace and a French door that leads to a private deck, ideal for entertaining, lounging and dining under the stars. The eat-in kitchen boasts imported Italian cabinets, a combination gas/electric cooktop with griddle and plenty of counter space for the serious cook. Two bedrooms and an updated bath with a combination tub/shower are on the main floor. Downstairs you’ll find the family room with a 2nd fireplace and French doors out to the rear patio and backyard. It's the perfect spot for movie nights and slumber parties. The huge laundry area offers plenty of room for your gym, home office or yoga studio. Just beyond the rear patio is the park-like backyard. This is a gardener’s paradise and the spot for picnics on the lawn, play, or simply relaxing in the California sunshine. Just minutes to the Montclair Village, East Bay regional parks & public transit.
Confidential Remarks: To show, call/text Dana at 510-813-0321 for alarm code. Offers to be heard Friday June 28th by noon. Remarks: Storybook 4BD/3BA Montclair Home w/stunning views from all 3 levels, contemporary updates throughout & bonus room to grow! 7027 Hemlock, which is conveniently located just above Montclair Village, greets visitors w/a bright FLR w/FP & sliders to an incredible view deck w/Bridge & Bay views. The views are also featured in the FDR w/sliders, and the fully-equipped modern kitchen w/B-fast bar. A cozy BD perfect for guests or au-pairs, a separate office area & full guest BA w/laundry completes this main level. Upstairs are 2 ample BDs, including a larger one w/bay windows, and one w/a private view balcony, and a 2nd updated full BA. For those wanting space & privacy, this top floor could make an excellent primary suite w/adjoining den or dressing room. The home's bottom level boasts a family room w/FP, a 4th BD w/view deck, a 3rd BA w/laundry, and a wet bar. This level could also make an attractive primary suite. Fresh paint, warm wood floors, period details, and updates, including newer fixtures & finishes, appliances & owned solar, run thru-out. A big lot, w/no neighbors directly behind, a big terraced rear yard, and a 2-car garage, completes this all-inclusive offering. Wonderful Montclair location, just minutes to hiking, shopping, dining, schools & easy commute access!
Confidential Remarks: As-is Trust Sale. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Gabriela Neagu - 415-965-9259 - Welcome to your dream home! This mid-century modern house located in a tranquil court in the Montclair hills, is offering the quintessential California indoor-outdoor living. The rustic living room is a bright and elegant space with hardwood floors and wood beam ceiling, a place where you can enjoy the warmth and comfort of a wood-burning fireplace or take in the stunning views of the Bay and city. Through the hallway, is the primary bedroom, a serene sanctuary where large windows let in plenty of natural light and shares a lovely view of the magnolia tree. The second bedroom is a cozy retreat that looks out to the lush backyard. Off to the left is the bathroom, a luxurious and relaxing space giving a spa-like experience with a deep soak tub, rain shower, quartz countertop, and generously-sized vanity. To the left, you will find the dining area and the kitchen – a modern and sleek space that combines functionality and style with quartz countertop, stainless steel appliances and custom shelving to maximize your storage capacity. The kitchen opens to a large deck that overlooks the Bay - perfect for al fresco dinners. For some fun and adventure, check out the whimsical treehouse. The house has a 509 sq ft basement that the seller currently uses as a  home office, gym, and laundry*
Confidential Remarks: Per OH measurements the main level is 890sqft  and the lower level as known as basement is 509sqft combined 1399sqft. Pre-escrow w/ Lori Endo @ORTC. SF & bed and bath count not verified or guaranteed. Radiant heat, on demand water heater, double pane windows, AC, deck , kitchen, bathroom, landscape and many more, must see ! Large driveway can accommodate several cars. OH 9/9, 9/10, 9/16and 9/17 from 2 to 4pm. Sunset tour Friday 9/15 from 5:30 to 7:30, beverages will be served. BOH 9/11 from 10am to 12pm. Sewer compliant, low pest. Offer date Tuesday 09/19 by 1pm. House is pending, no more showings please.
Public Remarks: Welcome to your dream home! This mid-century modern house located in a tranquil court in the Montclair hills, is offering the quintessential California indoor-outdoor living. The rustic living room is a bright and elegant space with hardwood floors and wood beam ceiling, a place where you can enjoy the warmth and comfort of a wood-burning fireplace or take in the stunning views of the Bay and city. Through the hallway, is the primary bedroom, a serene sanctuary where large windows let in plenty of natural light and shares a lovely view of the magnolia tree. The second bedroom is a cozy retreat that looks out to the lush backyard. Off to the left is the bathroom, a luxurious and relaxing space giving a spa-like experience with a deep soak tub, rain shower, quartz countertop, and generously-sized vanity. To the left, you will find the dining area and the kitchen – a modern and sleek space that combines functionality and style with quartz countertop, stainless steel appliances and custom shelving to maximize your storage capacity. The kitchen opens to a large deck that overlooks the Bay - perfect for al fresco dinners. For some fun and adventure, check out the whimsical treehouse. The house has a 509 sq ft basement that the seller currently uses as a  home office, gym, and laundry*

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Rebecca Loboschefsky - Agt: 512-364-1649 - Welcome home to a peaceful Mid-century home nestled in the Montclair neighborhood. It is perfect for anyone looking to feel far from the City all while still being quite close. The interior is the perfect blend of traditional charm and modern luxury (with upgrades galore), big open windows that boast plenty of natural light, hardwood floors, a living room fireplace, exposed cross beams, and a contemporary kitchen with all stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast counter. This home offers gorgeous views of the hills, surrounding woods, and beautiful trees that change with the seasons. In March - May, there are gorgeous cherry blossoms everywhere and the side yard transforms with wild flowers and daffodils. The sidehill provides extra privacy, quietness and the home sits higher than the neighbors. The backyard is surrounded by tall trees, features a wood deck with a romantic sitting area perfect for evening dinners, work-from-home shed with electricity/ethernet, and a herb garden. The location is ideal with its close proximity to hiking & biking trails, downtown Montclair, highly-rated restaurants such as; Kakui Sushi, Perle, Sliver, Farmstead Cheese and Wines all while still being commuter friendly to local airports (OAK & SFO) and to Berkeley, Walnut Creek & San Francisco.
Confidential Remarks: Public records states property is 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom; however, Sellers converted downstairs space into a bedroom with bathroom and laundry room without permits for a total of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms; see TDS on disclosures.   Pre-Escrow opened with Stewart Title in Walnut Creek, Escrow Officer: Rheanna Gieseking  Disclosure Link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/6403-Shelterwood-Drive-uodmxteg  Video Tour: https://baysnaps.aryeo.com/videos/81bdfad8-a834-4dc5-a170-2a92c7547cf1  Inspections included in disclosures, Sewer Lateral Complaint, Sidewalk Exemption, & per sellers, all Section 1 work completed. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Theresa Hope Broderick - 510-967-2294 - Tranquil light-filled contemporary home in the popular Montclair neighborhood. Blocks to East Bay Regional Parks, Montclair Village shops & dining. This spacious home has been thoughtfully designed w/exposed beams, vaulted ceilings, skylights & indoor/outdoor settings to enjoy the verdant views.  Four plus bedrooms & 3 updated bathrooms.  Newer spacious eat-in kitchen w/stainless appliances. Wine refrigerator & insta-water line. Custom island w/ natural stone countertops & seating. Wood stained cabinetry and ample storage.   Kitchen opens to a dining area with a large picture window. Living room has a fireplace and opens to a covered deck that is ideal for entertaining and outdoor dining. There is one bedroom and a full bath on the main level that opens to a landscaped private deck and courtyard.  Second floor has a spacious primary bedroom with a spa-like bathroom, hydrotherapy tub and a sunny deck.  There are two additional bedrooms and a plus room that is great for a home gym or playroom.  Additional updated large bathroom.  Home is equipped with AC, Nest, tankless water heater and laundry room. There is a large two car garage w/ interior access & room for additional storage.  Easy commute to SF and conveniently located near top rated schools!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Elizabeth Behrens - 510-381-2014 - This Montclair home features soaring ceilings and an abundance of natural light. On the main level is a large kitchen, with ample space for dining, has been tastefully updated with stainless appliances and high-quality cabinets. Up a partial flight of stairs are two bedrooms and a hall bathroom. A short flight down takes you to the spacious primary bedroom with a bathroom ensuite and two large closets. Back on the main level, from the living room you’ll enjoy views to the landscaped backyard. Adjacent to the living room, discover another generously sized room perfect for entertaining with convenient access to the deck nestled amidst mature maples. For those makers with a passion for craftsmanship, a two-car garage awaits, complete with a workbench and ample storage. This property is set in a beautiful private garden, terraced for easy access, a haven for nature enthusiasts and gardeners alike.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Jill Carrigan - Agt: 510-388-2585 - Nestled in the verdant and peaceful hills of Montclair, this charming yet sophisticated Tudor welcomes you home. A lush green lawn and lovely private gardens lure you to an oasis outdoors, while inside, a fusion of Old-World charm and clean lines create a sanctuary of modern living. Natural light streams through the windows of the spacious living room, showcasing the private patio and colorful gardens right outside the door. This inviting room epitomizes the beauty of 1930’s architecture, with millwork detailing the barreled ceilings and an artisan roped fireplace. High in design with the most current finishes, the kitchen & dining room combination is where friends and family gather to share the day's events. On warm summer nights, take to the spacious deck for al fresco while taking in the enchanting Bay and tree lined views. 4 spacious bedrooms include a primary suite with glorious views of the Bay and a sun-filled bathroom with Jacuzzi tub. The backyard is dreamy! Patio dining area, expansive lawn with play structure, and a secret orchard of fruit bearing trees - Cherry, lemon, Fig, Pluot, Plum and Apple. Just in time for summer BBQ’s! Mins to trails, a short drive to Montclair Village shops, dining & schools. Relax, settle in and watch the hawks soar by.  You are home!
Confidential Remarks: OFFERS DUE ON WEDNESDAY 6/28th by noon.  Open house Sat & Sun 24th & 25th.  Bedroom and Bathroom count advertised in MLS differ from public records.  Square footage advertised in MLS differs from public records. Square footage advertised derived from Open House Photography Drafting.

Remarks: Kevin C Brown - 510-593-4780 - Located in one of Oakland’s most popular neighborhoods, this beautiful two-story Montclair home with approximately 1,681 square feet of living space combines mid-century architecture with many modern updates and features wonderful indoor and outdoor living spaces. Upon entry you’ll be greeted by an open floor plan and spacious living room with access to a welcoming deck in a parklike setting, a formal dining room, cheery eat-in kitchen, and half bath. The patio off the kitchen is perfect for morning coffee, relaxation, or an evening cocktail. The upper level offers 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths, with one bedroom functioning as a wonderful en-suite.This comfortable home is just minutes to Montclair Village shops and restaurants, Shepherd Canyon Park, Thornhill & Montclair elementary schools, highway 13 and Rockridge BART. Combining city living with a peaceful, tranquil location, this serene mid-century home offers the very best of Oakland living and can provide comfort and functionality for almost any buyer’s needs.

Remarks: David Gunderman - 510-205-4369 - A Montclair Mid-century gem, 7011 Snake Road is a 4+BD/3.5BA refuge with panoramic bay views, open floor plan, multiple decks, family room loft, and a full-service apartment with private entrance. The home is beautifully configured for indoor/outdoor entertaining with space for conversation groups and mingling inside as well as access to a secluded patio and wrap-around deck. The main living area is enhanced by vaulted timber ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, and glass doors opening onto a wrap-around deck with views of Alcatraz and the Golden Gate Bridge. This level also includes an eat-in cook’s kitchen, dining room with access to an enclosed patio, a powder room, and a laundry/utility room. The upper level is an expansive, loft-style bonus space that might serve as a family room, home office, or guest room. On the lower level, the spacious primary suite features access to a private deck with bay views, and two additional bedrooms share a full bath. On the basement level, a full-service 1BD/1BA apartment enjoys a private deck and partial bay views.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Dana S. Cohen - 510-813-0321 - Feel worlds away, nestled just above Montclair Village in this sensational retreat with sweeping San Francisco Bay views from nearly every room. The open floorplan flows effortlessly to the front and rear gardens for easy outdoor entertaining and play. Updated with modern conveniences including an owned solar system and car charger, this property showcases the pride of ownership that has graced it for almost 40 years. Gated front gardens with a patio area are bathed in morning sun and the perfect spot to enjoy a cup of coffee. The front porch offers level-in access and opens to the dramatic living/dining great room with cathedral ceiling, random plank hardwood floors and breathtaking views extending from Mount Tamalpais to the South Bay. French doors open to a view deck with built-in bench seating and retractable awning. The adjoining kitchen features a center island, quartz countertops, 4-burner gas range, Fisher & Paykel French door refrigerator and built-in desk. The lower level includes a spacious family room, 3rd bedroom and full bath.  A large flex room with built-in cabinets, sink and fridge provides added comfort for guests or extended family. This home is less than a mile to the Montclair shops, restaurants, Sunday Farmer’s Market and recreational facilities
Confidential Remarks: To show, call/text Dana at 510-813-0321 for alarm code. Offers, if any, to be heard Friday morning 6/16 at 10 am. Neither the Seller nor the Grubb Company have verified or guarantee the square footage of the home or lot. 2001Asilomar.com   Prelim with Old Republic Title #1116039494 - Ina Dunlap in the Montclair office.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Dana S. Cohen - 510-813-0321 - Welcome to 6893 Saroni where sunlit spaces and timeless mid-century charm blend to create an updated retreat amidst a backdrop of mature trees and blue skies. As you head to the home you’ll discover a hidden level front lawn complete with a Meyer lemon tree and beautiful succulent garden. A perfect setting for enjoying a book on a picnic blanket or a game of corn throw. As you step into the home, you’ll experience a harmonious blend of mid-century elegance and modern comforts. The floor to ceiling brick wall makes a statement in the kitchen complete with new quartz countertops, counter seating and breakfast nook for casual dining. Adjoining the kitchen is the expansive family room with exposed beams, soaring ceiling and fireplace. Extend your gatherings outdoors from the open living/dining great room that leads to a secluded patio and large deck—a quintessential setting for alfresco soirées or cozy movie nights beneath the starry sky. Retreat to the bedroom wing with three tranquil bedrooms and updated baths which include the primary suite. Conveniently located near Montclair Village's charming cafes, shops, park, library and the Sunday Farmer's market with miles of regional parks close by, this mid-century gem offers the ideal blend of rural tranquility and urban accessibility.
Confidential Remarks: To show, call/text Dana for alarm code at 510-813-0321. Offers due at 2 pm on Tuesday, 5/21. No photos or videos without seller permission. New exterior walkways, with new outdoor lighting and landscape. Up on the hill above the home is a new deck and bench which you can enjoy breathtaking views of the Oakland/San Francisco Skyline Just minutes from downtown shopping in Montclair Village and Sundays Farmers Market. Hurry this property won't last!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Kristen Von Bargen - Cell: 510-326-6302 - Beautiful, updated mid-century modern with endless bay views, situated on one of Montclair’s best streets. New windows and sunny western exposure flood the home with natural light. Open, easy floorplan, with a roomy, comfortable flow from living and dining areas with wood burning fireplace right into the chic kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops enhanced by a beautiful zebra wood kitchen bar. Sliding doors lead to the recently rebuilt deck with modern cable railings - perfect for true indoor/outdoor living, and enjoying panoramic SF Bay sunsets. Hardwood floors flow throughout the living space into one bedroom and guest bath on the main level, plus primary bedroom w/ en-suite  bath and walk-in closet. Downstairs is another bed/bath, and large family room with fireplace and separate entrance. A wine cellar and large storage room/workshop complete this space. There’s even a hot tub and patio to relax in the serene, verdant surroundings. This home has all those hard-to-find features such as level-in entry, attached two car garage w/ int. access, owned solar, and sparkling four-bridge SF bay views. All of this just up from Montclair Village and Hwys 13 & 580, BART, and Bay Bridge – close to town, yet far enough away to make it a peaceful retreat!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Regina Jacobs - 510-693-7973 - New listing. Exceptional Montclair Contemporary. Nestled in a verdant setting and perched for maximum privacy, this home has been beautifully updated. The living room features two seating areas, one a cozy spot by the fireplace and the other a perfect area to linger with friends. The kitchen offers a chic peninsula island, ideal for the chef to create while entertaining. Two pantry cabinets will ensure that you’ll never run out of the essentials. The formal dining room opens to the kitchen. Large view windows wrap around the dining room, bathing the space in natural light. Just up from the living room, sliding doors lead out to an entertaining deck. There are three bedrooms all on one level, one a large primary suite with a newly remodeled bathroom. The hall bath is conveniently located between the other two bedrooms. On the lower level, you’ll find a large bedroom with a separate entrance great for a home office. The lot to the right of the house is included in the sale. Convenient to Montclair’s shops, restaurants, and transportation. Open Sunday 2-4:30.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Simon Black - 510-409-0026 - Welcome to this storybook A-frame home nestled into the Montclair Hills.  Built in 1973, this lovely 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, Air Conditioning, 1,784 sq. ft.* of great indoor living space with a large wrap-around deck, a backyard with multiple terraced areas for entertaining and a 2 car garage.Lydia and Gene have enjoyed this home for over 25 years and raised their family here. Now as empty nesters, they want to share the home with new owners who will create memories with their loved ones!The living room with a fireplace and large windows overlooks canyon views. Great flowers and fruit trees populate the magical gardens of this home, and canyon views can be enjoyed from multiple terraced locations! Close to Montclair Village shops, restaurants, services, parks, and trails. *Sq. ft. per public records

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: LEONORE C DEATON - 510-209-5317 - This spacious, Eichler-inspired, mid-century modern home offers an abundance of light, stunning views of the magnificent surrounding landscape, and incredible attention to flow, detail, and design. Expertly remodeled throughout, it has been featured in Sunset and Remodel Magazines. Cook, dine, and relax while enjoying open-concept living at its finest! The top-notch kitchen boasts custom cabinets, Artimide lighting, SubZero and Miele appliances and other distinguished finishes. The primary bedroom is luxurious with an en-suite bathroom featuring Thasos marble, tandem shower heads, and heated floors. An inviting family room, three more bedrooms, additional designer bathrooms and a laundry room add to the spacious lifestyle of this home. Incredible home office comes complete with a full bath and kitchenette, an additional 580+ s/f space which can be accessed from its own exterior entrance. Two-car garage with electric car charger, earthquake retrofitting, French drains, air conditioning, backup generator, a standing-seam metal roof and more. Spend warm summer evenings entertaining friends on the expansive flagstone patio under an umbrella of oak and cypress trees. Just minutes away from Montclair Village restaurants, the Montclair Railroad Trail, farmers market, and shops.
